item.title: By: Meaghan
item.dc:creator: Meaghan
item.description: Thank you so much. I decided to make this after seeing it on Masterchef and I'm so happy that I came across your link. I live in the US and we don't use the metric system (unfortunately). So I think that if I made this according to the original recipe that was posted, it wouldn't have turned out and I would have believed it was because of problems with converting grams to ounces, etc. I made this updated recipe and it came out beautifully and tasted delicious!
item.content:encoded: Thank you so much. I decided to make this after seeing it on Masterchef and I’m so happy that I came across your link. I live in the US and we don’t use the metric system (unfortunately). So I think that if I made this according to the original recipe that was posted, it wouldn’t have turned out and I would have believed it was because of problems with converting grams to ounces, etc. I made this updated recipe and it came out beautifully and tasted delicious!

item.title: By: Katie
item.dc:creator: Katie
item.description: Anita you are a life saver! I have been thinking about making this on and off ever since I saw it made on masterchef. I will definitely be following your instructions in the hope of creating a delice taht is even half as tasty looking as yours :)
